name: LIT 81A
title: Homer's Odyssey
description: Introduction to Homer's Odyssey, its hero, and its world. An epic tale of a man who abandons his family to fight in the Trojan War, then returns two decades later, the Odyssey was a profound influence on the culture of ancient Greece and Rome, and continues to shape our self-understanding today.
class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated discussion section
